page.title: 18LIFE IN BINGHAM (3)
page.content: "I like living in Bingham because it has a friendly atmosphere." "It has a good selection of shops." "It's in the countryside." "The best thing is it is near to big towns like Nottingham and Newark." { However it is hardly perfect and {there follows comments on how it may {be improved and what some of its {problems are considered to be:- "I do not like the pollution from trains and lorries and cars." "To make Bingham a better place I think they should build the bypass they have been talking about. The reason for this is all the lorries bringing lots of fumes in and also it is dangerous trying to get to school over the road." "I don't like the main road - it makes too much noise."
